product_name: Leki Thermolite XL Antishock Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: These antishock poles sport extended Aergon thermo grips, a Super Lock system that supports 300 lb. loads and a state-of-the-art spring system for exceptionally smooth and reliable trail performance.
short_description: These antishock poles sport extended Aergon thermo grips, a Super Lock system that supports 300 lb. loads and a state-of-the-art spring system for exceptionally smooth and reliable trail performance.
